title: Super Sock Man
description: Knitting Series Donnie's crush on his sister's roommate, Alejandro, has gone beyond childhood dreams-and it's driving Donnie insane! So when Donnie gets a chance to house-sit for his sister and Yandro, Donnie doesn't feel alone. He's got all his vivid fantasies to keep him company! Can a little dumb luck-and a little help from a magical homemade gift-help Donnie's fantasies come true?
author: Amy Lane
